title: Ravindra Kumar Kundu assumes office as Managing Director of Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company
description: Ravindra Kumar Kundu has started his five-year term as Managing Director of Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company. Appointed in July, Kundu brings over 36 years of experience in the automobile and financial services industry. He has been with the company for 24 years. He holds a Commerce degree and has completed several prestigious management programs.
